string.text: Adopting a simple gas-operated mechanism from Soviet SVT rifles, Nazi Germany developed the Gewehr 43 semi-automatic rifle. It was renamed Karabiner 43 in 1944. Equipped with the ZF 4 telescopic sight, it is an effective sniper rifle.\n %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: \n %c[d_purple] â€¢ %c[ui_gray_2] ZF-41 scope
